fields.Description/Abstract:
Lead writing and information workshops for participants presenting at Storyfort 2019 and 2020. 

None of the following involved a speaking role. These all involved organizing and participation. All activities were aired on Facebook Live through members' accounts as well as those of national members in United We Dream. Various Organizing Activities for PODER of Idaho, including: 

Keep Idaho Families Together: National Day of Action for Children. Capitol Steps. Boise, ID (June 30, 2018). (Over 3,000 attended).

Viewing and Q&A with staff from the Idaho Coalition Against Sexual & Domestic Violence. Rape on the Night Shift (Frontline). Linen Building. Boise, ID (March 13, 2018).

Participate in National Demonstrations alongside the national organization, United We Dream. National Capitol. Washington D.C. (October 2017 to January 2018).

DACA Protest. Idaho Capitol. Boise, ID (February 4, 2018)

Informational Meetings for DACA Recipients and their families. Linen Building. Boise,  ID (Jan 23, 2018).

Activist Academy. Linen Building. Boise, ID (Jan 2018).

DACA Informational Session – Kuna, ID (Jan 2018).

Visit with Raul Labrador’s staffer. Meridian, ID (Jan 2018).

New Year’s Eve Party Fundraiser. Linen Building. Boise, ID (2017-2018).
